description: A Female Saint Contemplating a Crucifix; Attributed to Giovanni Antonio Guardi (Italian, 1699 - 1760); Italy; 1745; Pen and brown ink with light brown wash, heightened with white bodycolor, over red chalk; 29.2 × 21 cm (11 1/2 × 8 1/4 in.); 96.GA.322; J.
